I personally needed to revaluate and rethink

translation.en: if this whole thing was worth it anymore.

Dublin.

Armadas.
I have a surprise for us.

Yeah, It's your boy.

Beautiful!

translation.en: Guys.
I don't think I can do this, -What? -[laughing]

translation.en: Go!
Hi!
[Boma] I'm Boma George, nice to meet you.

You know what, I have a few friends I'd like to introduce you to.

Oh cool! Cheers.
Cheers.
Nzenozo, Nzenozo!

Yes!
That was amazing!

[in Igbo] I thought you were coming today.

-We miss bro. -[in Pidgin] You are supposed to be here.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Guy, I would've collected your money.

translation.en: Guys.
You know what they say.

translation.en: Twenty guys can't be friends for twenty years.
Wait… What do you mean?
I think we've had a really good run.

translation.en: As the Armadas.
As a family.
[in Igbo] Ahanna my brother.
You've changed our lives.
I'm grateful.
I love you bro.
[in Igbo] Brother, come here.
Oh, guys!
[in Pidgin] Wow!
[in Pidgin] A group hug?
-Armadas! -[all] Ahuu!!!

The poor and the oppressed.

translation.en: Well, there you have it.

translation.en: The residence of the Jakande community can
very well thank the self proclaimed gang, The Armadas.

translation.en: Who many people have said, have shown up

translation.en: more than the elected officials.

translation.en: He must be concerned a...
Concerned!
The man is traumatized! He's asking if we should declare a state of emergency.
translation.zh: 他受到了精神创伤！ 他问我们 要不要宣布进入紧急状态

translation.en: Do you know what that means? To me? To us?

translation.en: -I do sir -No you don't!
translation.zh: 我知道 先生 不 你不知道！

translation.en: [man] Now listen Ngozi,
You are one of the most decorated officers in the Nigerian police history.
translation.zh: 你是尼日利亚警察史上 授勋最多的警官之一

translation.en: You got there, not just because you are damn good at what you do,
translation.zh: 你能走到今天 不仅是因为你工作优秀

translation.en: but because people like me,
translation.zh: 更是因为像我这样的人

translation.en: made sure that you are properly acknowledged.
translation.zh: 让你得到了相应的荣誉

translation.en: We may be family, but if those "Armada" or whatever they call themselves
translation.zh: 也许我们是一家人 但如果那什么无敌舰队 无论他们叫什么吧

translation.en: are not brought to justice,
and made scapegoat of, everything you ever worked for, will go down the drain.

translation.en: And I will be nowhere to save you!
translation.zh: 到时候 我都救不了你！

translation.en: Family or no family.
[Ahanna] Flaunting our newfound wealth in a popular nightclub was a bad idea.

translation.en: But we had been under the radar so long.
translation.zh: 但我们已经低调太久了

translation.en: Nze was getting restless. He wasn't the kind who enjoyed being under the radar.

translation.en: Sango's 18th birthday

translation.en: was his excuse. And he promised it would be lowkey.

translation.en: And just like that.
We went from invisible nobodies

translation.en: into invisible threats… in seconds.

translation.en: I need more.
More names.
[Timi] Snake. One of them was snake, as in "Ejo".

[in Pidgin] I swear.

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] He'll talk. -Sharp sharp.

move like a snake and then… [snaps]

Nze.

Nzenozo.

Definitely art.
So I'll get you the invite.
And that's for you.

Sure you will. Definitely.
Champagne!

translation.en: And so especially those that have to do with our ancestors and our culture.

translation.en: And to celebrate how far we have come,

translation.en: my friend here, Sarah Arquette, has something really big coming up.

translation.en: When I say big, I mean big. Something really big.

translation.en: And I'm sure your all going to love it.
translation.zh: 我相信你们一定会喜欢的

translation.en: So in the spirit of art and preserving our culture and heritage.

translation.en: the African ambassador to Louitre.
Please, your round of applause.
-Thank you. -[applause]
-You have the stage. -Thank you.
[Maimuna] Sure.
Good evening ladies and gentlemen. Thank you Maimuna for this esteemed honor.

translation.en: -Welcome. -Tonight as we
celebrate the Black Art heritage.

translation.en: It's fitting we mark this with one of the luxurious and oldest brands in the world.

translation.en: Louitres.
This spirit takes 100 years to make and it's the perfect spirit of celebration.

translation.en: So tonight we shall be toasting to a 100 years

translation.en: of continuous success and the Black Arts.

translation.en: [Maimuna] Cheers everyone. Cheers.
[all] Cheers.
Please enjoy the rest of the evening.

translation.en: -[woman] Good to see you. -Oh, thank you.
Enjoy the night. Hey!
Let's get out of here.
I can't leave my own party.

translation.en: Didn’t I say don’t ask questions that you're not ready to get the answers for?

translation.en: Where your friends at?
They're around.
Come on, go have fun, the night is just beginning, I will see you later ok? Hm?

translation.en: Okay.
Jesus Christ! Ike. I could have--
Good evening ma.
Where have you been?
You really shouldn’t be showing up like this you know?

translation.en: I can't risk being seen.
I know.
The Timi Philips attack.
translation.zh: 因为蒂米菲利普斯袭击事件

translation.en: Unfortunate.
We lost two of our men.
Was Mahmoud involved?
translation.zh: 马哈茂德跟此事有关吗？

translation.en: The money the Armadas stole belongs to Ali Mahmoud.
translation.zh: 无敌舰队偷走的钱 就是阿里马哈茂德的

translation.en: He was funding Timi Phillips campaign.
translation.zh: 他在资助蒂米菲利普斯的竞选

translation.en: Of course, he was.
The bounty is out on the Armadas head and two names have been mentioned.
translation.zh: 悬赏的对象是无敌舰队的头目 有两个名字被提到了

translation.en: A guy named Snake and Nze Okoli.
translation.zh: 一个叫响尾蛇 一个叫尼泽奥科利

translation.en: Nze is in our system from the 312 case about stolen drugs.
translation.zh: 尼泽在系统中能查到 312号毒品失窃案

translation.en: Okay… so what do you need?
Any intel on Nze, that can lead to the Armadas.
translation.zh: 任何关于尼泽的情报 能够指向无敌舰队的

translation.en: According to Smoke,
anyone who gets to this Snake guy, gets direct access to Ali Mahmoud.
translation.zh: 能抓到响尾蛇的人 就能直接接触到阿里马哈茂德

translation.en: Okay.
So many years I've tried to bring Ali Mahmoud to book.
translation.zh: 许多年来 我一直想让阿里马哈茂德伏法

translation.en: No one has been able to catch him.
Maybe because of his… political backing.
translation.zh: 也许是因为他的政治背景

translation.en: If you can get strong evidence against him,
translation.zh: 如果你能找到针对他的有力证据

translation.en: then you will be the one to nail him.
translation.zh: 那你就能将他绳之以法了

translation.en: We are close.
I can feel it.
You this bad boy.
[in Pidgin] Jesus! Bro don’t be angry.
[in Pidgin] we went to Nze's house and ransacked it, but couldn’t find him.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Then we saw this picture of him.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Ohiz said he knows the other person, His name is Egbe.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Egbe supplies us weapons sometimes.

translation.en: -[in Yoruba] Speak! -[in Yoruba] Ow! It's not serious.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Sir I know him from my area.

translation.en: [in Pidgin] But I've heard that he moved.
[in Pidgin] He moved somewhere better in VGC.

translation.en: There you have it!
The Idia mask. Our history, our culture.

translation.en: Long stolen, almost forgotten. Worth six million dollars.

translation.en: The colonialism of it all.
[in Pidgin] This is why the Black man never progresses.

translation.en: [sings in Pidgin] They have stolen our culture.

translation.en: [sings in Pidgin] They want to steal our riches.

translation.en: [sings in Pidgin] They want to steal our land.

translation.en: [sings] so fuck all this bitches!
Yeah yeah!
-[in Pidgin] I'm the original soldier man! -Original!
translation.zh: 我们是文物战士！ 文物战士！

translation.en: Wow! This is a lot.
How did you get all this information?

translation.en: I always have my ways.
You like?
I... [laughs]
-I love it so much. -Come on come on. Get to work.
[woman] Yes. Perfect. Isn't she beautiful?
translation.zh: 是的 完美 她很漂亮吧？

translation.en: Yes… She is beautiful.
[Bala in Pidgin] I really I'm a fine boy.
[in Pidgin] Here we go again.
Yes now.
[in Pidgin] I would offer Egbe but he doesn't need it.

translation.en: When you've figured out a plan, you tell my boys and we move.
translation.zh: 等你想好计划后 告诉我的兄弟 我们就行动

translation.en: First of all, I don’t do bank heists. It's too risky.
translation.zh: 首先 我不做抢银行的事 太冒险了

translation.en: Second of all, there is no way I can pull this off all by myself.
translation.zh: 第二 我一个人做不来

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Who said anything about you? All we need is that snake brain of yours.
translation.zh: 谁说让你自己去了？ 我们只需要你的蛇脑

translation.en: If anything happens to my wife and son, I swear to God--
translation.zh: 如果我的老婆孩子有什么事 我向上帝发誓…

translation.en: -There is no God. -[tense chord]
If you fuck up, their blood is on your head.
translation.zh: 如果你搞砸了 他们就死定了

translation.en: [Ahanna] There was no time to feel sorry for myself.
I knew I couldn’t trust Mahmoud. But my family was on the line.
translation.zh: 我知道 不能相信马哈茂德 但我的家人命悬一线

translation.en: My brothers included.
I need chalk.
I knew City bank well. despite being a small bank,
translation.zh: 我很了解城市银行 尽管是一家小银行

translation.en: on the third Friday of each month, City bank hands out civil servants payslip.
translation.zh: 每个月的第三个星期五 城市银行会发放公务员的工资

translation.en: You would never think it. But on these days,
translation.zh: 你绝对想不到 但在这几天

translation.en: this small sleepy Surulere bank, has over 200 million naira pass through it.
translation.zh: 这家苏鲁里尔区的小银行 流水有两亿奈拉

translation.en: The more I looked at the information, the more scared I got.
translation.zh: 越看这些信息 我就越害怕

translation.en: Tell Mahmoud I'm ready.
translation.zh: 告诉马哈茂德 我准备好了

translation.en: I've always wondered what a PhD in stealing looks like.
translation.zh: 我一直在想 盗窃专家是什么样的

translation.en: I erm, I have a question.
The person who got you this intel, he works with the bank?
translation.zh: 给你情报的那个人 他在银行工作吗？

translation.en: Something like that.
Can he... get the weapons into the premises?
What makes you think it’s a he?
He, she.
Does the person have the daily access to get our weapons in before we show up?
translation.zh: 在我们出现之前 那个人能把武器带进去吗？

translation.en: Something like that.
It’s a yes or no answer.
-If your answer is no? -This plan is useless.
translation.zh: 如果答案是不行 这计划就泡汤了

translation.en: Yes.
Great.
What is going on?
[Mahmoud] Nze, I thought there will be emotions, you know, hugs, kisses, no?
translation.zh: 尼泽 我还以为你们都会很激动呢 你知道吗？ 抱抱 亲亲 没有吗？

translation.en: [Ahanna] I didn’t plan for any of these to happen.
translation.zh: 我没想过会发生这种事

translation.en: [Ahanna] I got the money. I shared equally.
translation.zh: 我拿到钱了 我平分了

translation.en: So that’s why... they found you,
in your dream home... on a farm,
translation.zh: 在你的豪宅里 在农场上

translation.en: with your wife. Who just happened to be the curator of the gallery.
translation.zh: 跟你的妻子一起 她恰好是画廊的馆长

translation.en: Ahanna, do you think the people that surround you are stupid?
translation.zh: 阿汉纳 你觉得身边的人都很蠢吗？

translation.en: I'm sorry.
You're sorry? You're sorry?
You left me to rot in jail for five years.
translation.zh: 你让我在监狱里待了五年

translation.en: And you say you're sorry?
[in Igbo] I was in chains for five years,
You took away my freedom.
But...
You put your snakes in my baby sister's belly.
translation.zh: 你让我的妹妹怀上了小响尾蛇

translation.en: You got Amarachi pregnant.
You got my baby sister pregnant.
[whispers] Ahanna...
Amara was pregnant?
[Mahmoud] Okay, okay, Nze, it's okay, it's okay.
translation.zh: 好了 尼泽 可以了

translation.en: We've got work to do. Ah? Settle your grievances later.
translation.zh: 我们还有任务要完成 以后再解决你的委屈吧

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Anybody else have something to say?
[Egbe] When this is all over,
I will paint the streets with your blood.
translation.zh: 我会用你的鲜血涂满整条街道

translation.en: Wonderful, wonderful, at least you got it off your chest.
translation.zh: 太好了 至少你把话说出来了

translation.en: Snake.
As you have your plan, so I have mine.
translation.zh: 你有你的计划 我也有我的计划

translation.en: Four of you will do this job. And if you fuck me up,
translation.zh: 你们四个人会做这份工作 如果你们跟我捣鬼

translation.en: this man here
Spider, has instructions to kill your wife and your son.
translation.zh: 这位先生 蜘蛛 就会得到指示… 杀掉你的妻子和儿子

translation.en: Boys, we got work to do.
translation.zh: 孩子们 我们还有工作要做

translation.en: Go and prepare.
Nze, when you get into the bank, you are in charge.
translation.zh: 尼泽 你们进入银行以后 就归你负责了

translation.en: And if he does anything wrong, feel free to revisit your grievances.
translation.zh: 如果他在哪里做错了 你可以随意解决你的委屈

translation.en: Once you have the cash, call this number.
translation.zh: 等你拿到钱后 就打这个电话

translation.en: We'll be out in front ready to shoot anybody and any motherfucker that
translation.zh: 我们会站在前面 随时准备开火

translation.en: tries to stop you people from getting away.
Let's go.
Wait guys, we haven't even run through the plan yet.
translation.zh: 等等 各位 我们还没讲好计划呢

translation.en: Snake, it kills you not to be in charge huh?
translation.zh: 响尾蛇 不让你负责 你就难受吗？

translation.en: This is not about being in charge.
Common sense. We need to run through the plan.
translation.zh: 这是常识 我们得把计划过一遍

translation.en: [Bala] Mahmoud told us your plan.
translation.zh: 马哈茂德跟我们说过你的计划了

translation.en: [in Pidgin] We go in looking like civil servants coming for their pension.
translation.zh: 我们装作公务员去领工资

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Our weapons are in the toilet.
[in Pidgin] Find the money and we collect it.
translation.zh: 找到钱的位置 然后拿走

translation.en: [in Pidgin] And kill anyone that tries to stop us.
translation.zh: 谁想阻止我们 直接开枪击毙

translation.en: Kill? No, no, no. Killing is not part of the plan.
translation.zh: 击毙？计划里不包含杀人的

translation.en: Yeah.
That was my part of the plan.
[Ahanna] They're gonna kill us.
Once we hand over the money, we're dead.
translation.zh: 等我们把钱给他们 我们就死定了

translation.en: Don’t be stupid Nze. Trust me.
translation.zh: -该死的响尾蛇 -别傻了 尼泽 相信我

translation.en: Don't you know Smoke anymore?
He killed my wife in front of my daughter. I think we all know what he is capable of.
translation.zh: 他在我女儿面前 杀害了我的妻子 我们都知道他能做出什么事

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I didn’t know that.
translation.zh: 对不起 我不知道这件事

translation.en: They also have my wife and kid. So sorry.
translation.zh: 我的老婆孩子也在他们手里 对不起

translation.en: [whispers] I'm sorry.
Excuse me please, where's the toilet?
translation.zh: 不好意思 厕所在哪里？

translation.en: Thank you.
-[Nze] Everybody go down! -[screaming]
Down! Down all of you!
translation.zh: 趴下！ 所有人都趴下！

translation.en: If you touch that... you'll meet your maker.
translation.zh: 如果你敢碰那里 你就死定了

translation.en: Where is the manager? Manager?
Where is the Manager!
[in Pidgin] Where do you keep the money?
Up...upstairs.
[in Pidgin] Let's go.
[Nze] Downstairs where my eyes will be on you.
translation.zh: 你去楼下 我会盯着你的

translation.en: There's over 200 million upstairs.
And there's no way Bala can get it out, by himself.
translation.zh: 巴拉也不可能自己搬呀

translation.en: Egbe is the best man for this place. So you either go or I go.
translation.zh: 这里最合适让艾格留下来 所以要么你去 要么我去

translation.en: Smoke's boys are at the entrance and exit. Any snake business, you are dead.
translation.zh: 烟鬼的人在入口和出口 只要耍花招 你就死定了

translation.en: [Ahanna] Let's go.
[in Pidgin] Open the vault!
Bala, Bala.
[in Pidgin] What is it Ahanna?! What?
translation.zh: 怎么了 阿汉纳？怎么了？

translation.en: I'm so sorry, I didn’t know.
[in Pidgin] Did you care for my family while I was in prison?
translation.zh: 我坐牢时 你关心过我的家人吗？

translation.en: Of course I did. I sent money to them every single month.
translation.zh: 当然了 我每个月都寄钱给他们

translation.en: I swear to you bruv.
Open this thing!
[in Pidgin] Why should I trust you?
[in Pidgin] Five years, why should I trust you?
translation.zh: 五年了 我为什么要相信你？

translation.en: You can always trust me, you know.
translation.zh: 你可以永远相信我的 你知道的

translation.en: I didn’t know you guys were going to be here today, There's something I need to tell you.
translation.zh: 我不知道你会来这里 我有件事要告诉你

translation.en: [man] You really are a mastermind.
You know me?
I grew up wanting to be like you.
[in Pidgin] will you like to work with me?
I said open this door!
[in Pidgin] Open it, stop wasting our time.
translation.zh: 赶紧打开 别再浪费我们的时间了

translation.en: [in Pidgin] Sit down there.
What the fuck?
[Smoke] I don’t know boss. But something crazy is happening.
translation.zh: 我不知道 老大 但发生了一些很疯狂的事

translation.en: It's like they know what's happening in the bank.
translation.zh: 他们好像知道是怎么回事了

translation.en: [Ike] It's them. They're back. Excuse me. It's them. The Armadas.
translation.zh: 是他们 他们回来了 不好意思 是他们 无敌舰队

translation.en: [Ngozi] Why will they let the public in on an active robbery?
translation.zh: 他们为什么要让公众知道 他们正在进行抢劫？

translation.en: [Ike] I'm going to figure that out.
-[in Pidgin] What is wrong with you? -Get out of the way!
Nze what are you doing? Stand down!
translation.zh: -你在做什么？退下！ -外面是什么情况？

translation.en: [in Igbo] What's happening outside?!
translation.zh: -你在做什么？退下！ -外面是什么情况？ -外面怎么了？ -你在搞什么？

translation.en: [in Igbo] What's wrong with you! Let's leave!
translation.zh: -外面怎么了？ -你在搞什么？ 我们走吧！

translation.en: Oh my God!
[in Pidgin] Who wants to play Jesus Christ?
[Egbe] Let's go, let's go, let's go.
Egbe, there's no issue.
translation.zh: 艾格比 有一个问题

translation.en: Once you get out, there's a crowd out there, spray them.
translation.zh: 你出去以后 会有一群人 把钱撒出去

translation.en: Let's go.
[Ahanna] The crowd was bigger than I ever imagined.
translation.zh: 那群人的人数超乎我的预料

translation.en: It was like a protest. The kind that swells and spills.
translation.zh: 就像抗议一样 人群嘈杂拥挤

translation.en: Overflowing the street with chaos. This was my escape plan.
translation.zh: 街道一片混乱 这就是我的逃跑计划

translation.en: I just needed to get a message to the right person.
translation.zh: 我只需要把信息发给适当的人

translation.en: Snake!
And once the opportunity presented itself, I took it.
translation.zh: 一旦机会出现… 响尾蛇！ 就紧紧抓住

translation.en: Sparrow to Control, Control how do you read?
translation.zh: 麻雀呼叫控制中心 控制中心 你们能听清吗？

translation.en: -[man] Loud and clear sparrow. -[Nze] Snake!
[in Pidgin] Get out of the way! Snake!
[man] Overhead the scene of the bank robbery at broad street
translation.zh: 我们正在 布罗德街的银行抢劫案现场上空

translation.en: A rapid response squad and a team of policemen
translation.zh: 一个快速反应小组和一队警察

translation.en: have condoned up the entire area.
[in Igbo] Can you kill a dead man?
translation.zh: 你们能杀死一个已死之人吗？

translation.en: [Ahanna] I thought watching my mother die was the worst thing
translation.zh: 我以为看着母亲死去 就是我一生中的至暗时刻了

translation.en: that could ever happen to me.
translation.zh: 就是我一生中的至暗时刻了

translation.en: Until I watched my brother die.
translation.zh: 直到我看到自己的兄弟死去

translation.en: Amara.
Please.
Put the gun down.
[Ahanna in Igbo] Please.
I didn’t know you were pregnant.
I only just found out this morning. Nze told me this morning. I swear to God.
translation.zh: 我今早才知道的 尼泽刚告诉我的 我对上帝发誓

translation.en: Put the gun down.
Ahanna!
[in Igbo] Adaugo, stay in the car, please. Stay in the car!
translation.zh: 阿多戈 不要下车 留在车里！

translation.en: [in Igbo] Please. Please, please. Please don’t shoot. Please don’t kill him.
translation.zh: 求你了 不要开枪 不要杀他

translation.en: I loved him too. Amara, Nze was my brother, you know.
translation.zh: 我也爱他的 阿玛拉 尼泽是我的兄弟 你知道的

translation.en: I'm sorry.
[boy] Mum, come on.
Guess what? I won the game.
Just stop... Keep playing.
translation.zh: 别说了 继续玩吧 好吗？

translation.en: Okay? Keep playing, we'll be with you shortly. We love you!
translation.zh: 继续玩吧 我们马上就过去 我们爱你

translation.en: You have a child?
Which do you prefer?
Freedom
or love?
Love.
Wrong answer.
[Adaugo] I...I love you.
God why!!!
There are key moments in one's life.
translation.zh: 人生中有许多关键时刻

translation.en: That shape the core of who you are.
Who you become.
This... would be my son's first.
translation.zh: 这是我儿子的第一次关键时刻

translation.en: His first memory.
Subtitled by: Anu Akiyode
